metadata.title: CVE-2023-46862 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 6.5.9. During a racewith SQ thread exit, an io_uring/fdinfo.c io_uring_show_fdinfo NULL pointerdereference can occur.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
